title: 谁来帮我看看崩溃报告
author: 又忘记名字
txt_content:
在打开E时 shift+鼠标左键或右键 程序就自动关闭了T.T
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Would you like a cupcake?

Time: 14-8-6 下午11:19
Description: Unexpected error

replies.txt_content: thaumcraft(神秘时代)导致的崩溃，删掉神秘再试试
